articles.title: About this site
articles.description: Some additional details about the website

articles.title: MEASURING PSYCHOLOGY
articles.contents:
Measuring Psychology is a global community and study group of aspiring and current students, professors, and interested people that help each other. We all have an interest in measurement theory for psychology and psychometrics. Through discussions, solidarity, and openness, we are boosting psychological science by improving measurement. Join our discussion Reading list Here you will find papers suggested by our community and you may add a suggestion yourself. Sign up If you want to take part in our live sessions, follow this link to fill the interest form. Community
